GSD.description:
Bluetooth: Fix use after free in hci_send_acl

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.238 by commit 684e505406abaeabe0058e9776f9210bf2747953. For more details please see the references link.
